Package entity

Class SnakeEntity

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.SnakeEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollisionElement, EngineComponent
public class SnakeEntity
extends Entity
implements CollisionElement
The SnakeEntity class is responsible for moving and handling precise collision checks for the in-game snakes

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  SnakeEntity.DIRECTION
    An enum containing the possible directions of the snake movement
    private static class  SnakeEntity.SnakePart
    An inner class used to encapsulate the information of each part of the snake
    private static class  SnakeEntity.SnakeTurn
    An inner class used to encapsulate a turn which needs to be made by the snake

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage bodyImage
    The image to be used for the body parts of the snake
    protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage headImage
    The image to be used for the head of the snake
    protected int partHeight
    The height of the snake, as dictated by the height of the image used for the head/body
    protected int partWidth
    The width of the snake, as dictated by the width of the image used for the head/body
    protected Player player
    The Player instance attached to this snake
    protected java.util.LinkedList<SnakeEntity.SnakePart> snake
    The parts of the snake
    protected SnakeEntity.DIRECTION startDirection
    The starting direction of the snake
    protected int startSize
    The starting size of the snake
    protected int startX
    The starting X position of the snake
    protected int startY
    The starting Y position of the snake
    protected java.util.LinkedList<SnakeEntity.SnakeTurn> turns
    A record of turns made by the snake
    protected int velocity
    The velocity of the snakes movement

    Fields inherited from class entity.Entity

    gameInstance

  • Constructor Details

    • SnakeEntity

      public SnakeEntity​(SnakeGame game, int x, int y, int size, SnakeEntity.DIRECTION dir, Player player)
      Constructs a snake instance, sets the initial size and direction, and finds the width and height of each snake part
      Parameters:
      game - The SnakeGame instance the snake is attached to
      x - The starting-x position of the snake
      y - The starting-y position of the snake
      size - The starting-size of the snake
      dir - The starting-direction of the snake
      player - The player the snake is attached to

    • SnakeEntity

      public SnakeEntity​(SnakeGame game, Player player)
      Constructs an instance of the SnakeEntity by using default starting parameters
      Parameters:
      game - The SnakeGame instance the snake is attached to
      player - The Player instance the snake belongs to

  • Method Details

    • increaseLength

      public void increaseLength​(int amount)
      Increases snake length by adding a new part to the END of the chain
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount that the snake should be increased by

    • changeDirection

      public void changeDirection​(SnakeEntity.DIRECTION newDirection)
      Change the direction of the snake by inserting a SnakeTurn just in front of the snake
      Parameters:
      newDirection - The new direction of the snakes movement

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Fetch the attached player
      Returns:
      Returns the Player instance that the snake belongs to

    • getPlayerId

      public int getPlayerId()
      Fetch the player ID from the attached player
      Returns:
      Returns the Player instances ID

    • createCollisionBox

      protected java.awt.Rectangle createCollisionBox​(int x, int y, int deltaX, int deltaY)
      Creates a collision box representing the movement of the snake during the last update tick
      Parameters:
      x - The x value of the collision
      y - The y value of the collision
      deltaX - The deltaX value of the collision
      deltaY - The deltaY value of the collision
      Returns:
      The collision box

    • moveSnake

      public java.util.LinkedList<java.awt.Rectangle> moveSnake()
      Move the snake according to the velocity of the snake. Any SnakeTurn instances found in the way of the snakes movement will be executed
      Returns:
      A list of collision boxes that represent the snakes movement

    • getBounds

      public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      Returns a rough bounding box of this snake; of course, because a snake is not always rectangular, this bounding box is for preliminary checks ONLY. It should only be used to ignore potential collisions, not to confirm them.
      Specified by:
      getBounds in interface CollisionElement
      Returns:
      Returns the boundary

    • proveCollisionIntent

      private boolean proveCollisionIntent​(java.awt.Rectangle sourceCollision, java.awt.Rectangle infringedBoundary)
      Prove the collision provided is with intent, and not just an incidental collision caused by the snake parts being close together. A collision is proven to have intent, if the head of the snake is heading TOWARDS the collision
      Parameters:
      sourceCollision - The collision box to be tested
      infringedBoundary - The collision box that has been collided with
      Returns:
      Returns true if the collision should be acted upon, false otherwise

    • isCollisionBoxIntersecting

      public java.awt.Rectangle isCollisionBoxIntersecting​(java.awt.Rectangle collision, CollisionElement source)
      Tests if the collision box provided is intersecting with the boundary of this snake
      Specified by:
      isCollisionBoxIntersecting in interface CollisionElement
      Parameters:
      collision - The collision box to test
      source - The source of the collision
      Returns:
      Returns true if the collision box is intersecting this snake, false otherwise

    • collidedWithGameBoundary

      public boolean collidedWithGameBoundary​(java.awt.Rectangle collisionBox)
      Informs the game that the snake has died due to a collision with the game boundary
      Specified by:
      collidedWithGameBoundary in interface CollisionElement
      Parameters:
      collisionBox - The collision box to test
      Returns:
      Returns true to confirm that the collision has been consumed

    • collidedWithBy

      public boolean collidedWithBy​(java.awt.Rectangle collision, CollisionElement source, java.awt.Rectangle infringedBoundary)
      Informs the snake that it's been collided with. This method will check if the collision originated from itself (loss), or if another snake has collided with this entity (win). If both snakes collide head-on, a tie condition is reached.
      Specified by:
      collidedWithBy in interface CollisionElement
      Parameters:
      collision - The collision box
      source - The source of the collision
      infringedBoundary - The boundary that has been infringed
      Returns:
      Returns true if the collision was consumed, false otherwise

    • update

      public void update​(double dt)
      Updates the snake every tick, moves the snake, checks collisions and updates the attached Player instance
      Specified by:
      update in interface EngineComponent
      Parameters:
      dt - Time since the last update

    • checkCollisions

      private void checkCollisions​(java.util.LinkedList<java.awt.Rectangle> collisionBoxes)
      Checks the collisions provided by handing them off to the CollisionController attached to the gameInstance
      Parameters:
      collisionBoxes - A list of the collisions to be tested

    • paintComponent

      public void paintComponent()
      Draws the snake
      Specified by:
      paintComponent in interface EngineComponent
